name: City Sniper Gun Shooter - Commando War
name_original: City Sniper Gun Shooter - Commando War
description:
Welcome soldier, this an emergency survival mission for the city. The terrorists are everywhere in the streets and harmful for innocent peoples. Your mission is to kill the terrorists and clean up the mess from the city. Use your special army spy training to kill the terrorists and your secret mission is to kill them without getting hurt and then the job is to travel deep into enemy territory to locate and eliminate hidden targets. Stare down your rifle scope, zoom in to find and identify the target. Take a breath, and pull the trigger to make the shot.

City Sniper Gun Shooter - Commando War is designed for shooting the terrorists who are entering in city and you have overcome on the terrorist with challenging missions in special sniper war to show guerrilla commando skills. Sniper shooting is the most challenging and adventure FPS game. Perform secret commando adventure shooting to show specialized sniper skills like a military assassin in gangster city with thrilling and brutal sniper missions. Feel yourself like city sniper shooter in modern war zone with deadly missions.

Features of City Sniper Gun Shooter - Commando War:
• Realistic 3D graphics of war environment.
• Latest Sniper Guns.
• Smooth and easy Controls.
• Challenging missions and game play.
• Realistic sound effects

Realistic scenes, intense battle scenes as well as simple controls for commando sniper shooting game. You are a modern elite sniper ready to play your part in dangerous attacks and silent assassin missions. Eliminate a mob of enemies at street level or take out the single high-profile target. With access to an inventory of sniper and assault rifles, you will rely on your marksman skills to finish the work. 
Download City Sniper Gun Shooter - Commando War game now and eliminate evil from your city.
